title: 蚊叮人同吸人血係咪兩回事黎？

replies.msg:
岩岩訓訓下覺發現隻腳好痕
比蚊咬左2啖 於是我就開始搵隻蚊出黎
結果比我搵到 拍死埋佢
問題來了 隻蚊冇血既
平時拍死岩咬完我既蚊都會即刻爆血
今次竟然冇
係咪代表間房仲有第2隻蚊
定係隻蚊純粹叮一叮我需唔係吸血
求專家分析

They often take several attempts, and a couple of minutes, to find one. And unexpectedly, around half of the ones that Choumet tested failed to do so. While they could all bite, it seemed that many suck at sucking.

http://phenomena.nationalgeographic.com/2013/08/06/heres-what-happens-inside-you-when-a-mosquito-bites/

蚊吸血時會嘗試插入皮膚唔同位置搵出血管所在而吸取血液。所以並非每吸 mosquito bite 都會吸走你身上血液。

They often take several attempts, and a couple of minutes, to find one. And unexpectedly, around half of the ones that Choumet tested failed to do so. While they could all bite, it seemed that many suck at sucking.

http://phenomena.nationalgeographic.com/2013/08/06/heres-what-happens-inside-you-when-a-mosquito-bites/

蚊吸血時會嘗試插入皮膚唔同位置搵出血管所在而吸取血液。所以並非每吸 mosquito bite 都會吸走你身上血液。

咁每次叮一吓會唔會都有紅腫痕癢？
定吸咗血先會有

同問

我記得唔係因為叮先會紅腫
係因為佢係個位塗左啲野上去
放便佢叮入去?
唔太記得，可能有錯

咁每次叮一吓會唔會都有紅腫痕癢？
定吸咗血先會有

會紅腫痕癢係因為蚊叮人嗰時佢啲口水嘅成分會引起人皮膚敏感
所以佢有叮你就會痕 唔一定係吸咗血
好似係

同問




http://www.prevention.com/health/mosquito-bite-reaction

When the female mosquito "bites" you, she inserts the tip of her mouth into one of your blood vessels, injecting her saliva into your bloodstream. The saliva includes a protein that prevents your blood from clotting as she eats. (Ick.) It's these proteins, not the bite, that cause the swelling, redness, and itching that some—but not all—of us experience.

佢呢度寫蚊嘅口水當中有一種蛋白質令血液不能凝固，但其實正確學名叫 抗凝劑 ( Anticoagulant )





唔同品種嘅奜有唔同嘅抗凝劑, 其中傳播瘧疾嘅蚊釋放嘅抗凝劑 係 Antithrombin ，

有人就研究抑制呢隻抗凝劑可唔可以防止瘧疾


https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pubmed/21511958

They often take several attempts, and a couple of minutes, to find one. And unexpectedly, around half of the ones that Choumet tested failed to do so. While they could all bite, it seemed that many suck at sucking.

http://phenomena.nationalgeographic.com/2013/08/06/heres-what-happens-inside-you-when-a-mosquito-bites/

蚊吸血時會嘗試插入皮膚唔同位置搵出血管所在而吸取血液。所以並非每吸 mosquito bite 都會吸走你身上血液。

咁每次叮一吓會唔會都有紅腫痕癢？
定吸咗血先會有

同問




http://www.prevention.com/health/mosquito-bite-reaction

When the female mosquito "bites" you, she inserts the tip of her mouth into one of your blood vessels, injecting her saliva into your bloodstream. The saliva includes a protein that prevents your blood from clotting as she eats. (Ick.) It's these proteins, not the bite, that cause the swelling, redness, and itching that some—but not all—of us experience.

佢呢度寫蚊嘅口水當中有一種蛋白質令血液不能凝固，但其實正確學名叫 抗凝劑 ( Anticoagulant )





唔同品種嘅奜有唔同嘅抗凝劑, 其中傳播瘧疾嘅蚊釋放嘅抗凝劑 係 Antithrombin ，

有人就研究抑制呢隻抗凝劑可唔可以防止瘧疾


https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pubmed/21511958



即每一次吸血，即使無命中血管，蚊都會從口水中釋放凝血劑令皮膚作出敏感反應，從而紅腫
應該post係學術台

應該post係學術台
